[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Send your minion to fish fish.

**Usage**

- `/fish name:<string> [quantity:<integer>] [flakes:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The thing you want to fish. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity you want to fish (optional). | - |
| `flakes` | `boolean` | No | Use spirit flakes? | - |

**Examples**

- `/fish name:Shrimp`
